unnormalised: Bhai, geometry exam-ak tumkam shubhechha! Te soglle sin, cos, tan che values ugddas dovornn mhunntlear pi che 100 ank ugddas dovornn jevn - ekdom asaky, punn nimnnea kshannak ek theorem tumche topeentlean bhair kaddpak tumkam shubhechha!
normalised: Bhai, geometry examak tumkam best wishes! Te soglle sine, cosine, tangent che values ugddas dovornam mhunllear pi che ek shatak ank ugddas dovornam sarkhem - ekdom ashakya, punn nimanne ghadiek ek theorem hatantlean kadun haddak tumkam shubhechha!
